introText: The Ministry of the Solicitor General ensures public safety through policing, correctional services, emergency management, and fire safety, protecting communities across Ontario.
descriptionText: The Ontario Ministry of the Solicitor General spent $3.9B in fiscal year (FY) 2023-24, representing 1.9% of the $206.6B in total provincial spending. This investment supports the OPP, correctional facilities, and emergency services.
roleText: Public safety is a core government responsibility. This ministry operates the Ontario Provincial Police, manages correctional institutions, coordinates emergency response, and supports community safety initiatives across the province.
programsDescription: The Ministry of the Solicitor General operates programs including the Ontario Provincial Police, correctional services, emergency management, fire safety oversight, 911 services, and community policing grants.
